roleset.name: natural disaster: landslide

example.name: landslide-n
example.text: 33 dead after 10,000 tonne landslide in Guatemala

example.name: landslide-n
example.text: a shallow translational landslide (with a volume of about 104 m3) affected the slope, thus completely destroying the already constructed structures.

roleset.note: LANDSLIDE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to avalanche, mudslide, rockslide, lahar. (from landslide.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
